articles.author: Hollie Richardson, Danielle De Wolfe, Sammy Gecsoyler, Phil Harrison, Katie Rosseinsky
articles.title: TV tonight: the gritty underworld of 90s Japan in Tokyo Vice - The Guardian
articles.description: Jake Adelstein’s gripping memoir gets a stylish TV adaptation. Plus: Louis Theroux has a frank interview with Canadian standup Katherine Ryan. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
Tokyo Vice
9.10pm, BBC One
There is no murder in Japan, says a police officer. Unless you have to deal with a witness, its never murder. Welcome to this stylish, gritty and full-throttle adaptation… [+2201 chars]
